SDL2.buildMain: emcc backends/sdl2/sdl_app.c -o build/sdl_app.js -s WASM=1 -s USE_SDL=2 -s MAIN_MODULE=2 -s EXPORTED_FUNCTIONS="['_main','_setUpdateFunc','_SDL_SetRenderDrawColor','_SDL_RenderClear','_SDL_RenderFillRect','_SDL_RenderPresent', 'SDL_RenderDrawRect']" -s EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS="['addFunction','wasmMemory','wasmTable']" -s ALLOW_TABLE_GROWTH
SDL2.buildLogic: emcc game/game.c -O2 -s SIDE_MODULE=2 -s IMPORTED_MEMORY -s EXPORTED_FUNCTIONS="['_update']" -o build/game.wasm -s USE_SDL=2
